docs.title: Professional Summary
docs.text: As a dedicated, self-motivated professional, I specialise in coaching high-performing teams, building platforms, and driving strategic technical initiatives. My expertise encompasses the full spectrum of infrastructure modernisation, from legacy system transitions to cutting-edge cloud-native architectures.

docs.title: HashiCorp Stack
docs.text:
• Terraform: Infrastructure as Code for multi-cloud environments
  • Vault: Secrets management, encryption as a service, identity-based access

docs.title: Cloud & Infrastructure
docs.text:
• Cloud Platforms: AWS, Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
  • DevSecOps: Security-first development and operations practices
  • Infrastructure as Code: Terraform, Packer, configuration management
  • Hybrid Cloud Architecture: Multi-cloud and on-premises integration

docs.title: Industry Experience
docs.text:
Throughout my career, I have delivered solutions across multiple sectors:

  • Cloud Consulting: Multi-cloud strategy and transformation
  • Financial Services & Capital Markets: Hybrid cloud solutions, HPC platforms, compliance-focused architectures
  • IT Services & Consulting: Infrastructure architecture and technical leadership
  • Public Sector & Government: Enterprise architecture, IaaS/PaaS/SaaS solutions
  • Technology & Software: HashiCorp ecosystem implementation and advisory

docs.title: Key Achievements
docs.text:
• Achieved Google Developer Expert (GDE) status
  • Built accelerators for Cloud Adoption using Infrastructure as Code
  • Coached and mentored apprentices and junior engineers
  • Established Infrastructure as Code best practices and engineering standards
